name: Wedding
short_description: Celebrate the union of two souls in a magical ceremony.
details_description: A wedding is a beautiful celebration of love and commitment. It involves a ceremony where two people pledge their love and commitment to each other. Whether you're planning an intimate gathering or a grand affair, we're here to make your special day memorable.

name: Birthday Party
short_description: Celebrate another year of life with friends and family.
details_description: A birthday party is a joyous occasion to celebrate another year of life. It's a time to gather with friends and family, enjoy delicious food, and create lasting memories. Whether it's a milestone birthday or a casual get-together, we'll help you plan a party that reflects your personality and style.

name: Anniversary
short_description: Commemorate years of togetherness and cherished moments.
details_description: An anniversary is a special milestone that deserves to be celebrated. It's a time to reflect on the journey you've shared and to look forward to the future. Whether it's your first year together or a golden anniversary, we'll help you plan an event that captures the essence of your love story.

name: Engagement Party
short_description: Announce your commitment surrounded by loved ones.
details_description: An engagement party is a wonderful way to share the excitement of your commitment with family and friends. It's a time to celebrate your love story and the journey ahead. Whether you prefer an intimate gathering or a lively celebration, we'll help you create an event that sets the perfect tone for your future together.

name: Retirement Party
short_description: Bid farewell to a valued colleague and welcome a new chapter.
details_description: A retirement party is a heartfelt way to honor the achievements and contributions of a valued colleague. It's a time to celebrate their accomplishments and wish them well in their new journey. Whether you're planning a casual gathering or a formal event, we'll help you create a memorable farewell.

name: Baby Shower
short_description: Celebrate the upcoming arrival of a bundle of joy.
details_description: A baby shower is a joyous occasion to celebrate the imminent arrival of a new family member. It's a time to shower the parents-to-be with love, well wishes, and practical gifts. Whether you prefer a themed event or a traditional gathering, we'll help you plan a baby shower that's filled with warmth and excitement.
